statements: SELECT * FROM green_energy_generation;
SELECT building_name, energy_source FROM green_energy_generation WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, generation_capacity FROM green_energy_generation WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM green_energy_generation ORDER BY generation_capacity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_source FROM green_energy_generation;
SELECT building_name, generation_capacity FROM green_energy_generation WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM green_energy_generation ORDER BY generation_capacity DESC;
SELECT building_name, energy_source FROM green_energy_generation WHERE generation_capacity > 500 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_source FROM green_energy_generation;
SELECT building_name, energy_source, generation_capacity FROM green_energy_generation WHERE generation_capacity BETWEEN 300 AND 700 ORDER BY generation_capacity;
SELECT * FROM building_installations;
SELECT building_name, installation_date FROM building_installations;
SELECT * FROM energy_generation WHERE energy_generated > 100;
SELECT building_name, generation_date FROM building_installations JOIN energy_generation ON building_installations.building_id = energy_generation.building_id;
SELECT building_name, installation_date FROM building_installations WHERE renewable_energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM building_installations WHERE building_name = 'Headquarters'
SELECT building_name, renewable_energy_source FROM building_installations WHERE installation_date > '2020-01-01'

SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_generated) AS total_energy_generated FROM building_installations JOIN energy_generation ON building_installations.building_id = energy_generation.building_id GROUP BY building_name
SELECT building_name, energy_generated FROM building_installations LEFT JOIN energy_generation ON building_installations.building_id = energy_generation.building_id WHERE energy_generated > 1000
SELECT building_name, installation_date FROM building_installations WHERE renewable_energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingInstallation
SELECT building_id, building_name FROM GreenBuildingInstallation
SELECT building_id, building_name, location FROM GreenBuildingInstallation
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySource
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM RenewableEnergySource
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingInstallation WHERE location='New York'
SELECT building_id, building_name FROM GreenBuildingInstallation ORDER BY building_name DESC
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM RenewableEnergySource WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%' OR sensor_type LIKE '%humidity%'
SELECT * FROM EnergyGeneration WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM green_buildings ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT building_name, consumption_amount FROM green_buildings JOIN energy_consumption ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption.building_id ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT source_name, generation_date FROM energy_sources JOIN energy_generation ON energy_sources.source_id = energy_generation.source_id WHERE generation_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM green_buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM green_buildings WHERE online_status = TRUE;
SELECT energy_sources.source_name, energy_generation.generation_amount FROM energy_sources JOIN energy_generation ON energy_sources.source_id = energy_generation.source_id;

SELECT building_name, consumption_amount FROM green_buildings JOIN energy_consumption ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption.building_id WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT building_name, consumption_amount FROM green_buildings JOIN energy_consumption ON green_buildings.building_id = energy_consumption.building_id GROUP BY building_name HAVING SUM(consumption_amount) > 50000;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuilding;
SELECT building_name, city, state FROM GreenBuilding;
SELECT * FROM EnergySource WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT building_name, address FROM GreenBuilding WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT building_name, city, state, usage_amount FROM GreenBuilding JOIN BuildingEnergyUsage ON GreenBuilding.building_id = BuildingEnergyUsage.building_id;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuilding;
SELECT building_name, city, state FROM GreenBuilding ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergySource WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT building_name, usage_amount FROM GreenBuilding JOIN BuildingEnergyUsage ON GreenBuilding.building_id = BuildingEnergyUsage.building_id WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY usage_amount DESC;
SELECT b.building_name, c.consumption_amount FROM GreenBuilding b JOIN EnergyConsumption c ON b.building_id = c.building_id WHERE c.consumption_amount < 500 ORDER BY c.consumption_amount ASC;
